author: jtraglia
content:
Hopefully in a couple days. I'm sort of waiting for resolution on this PR:

author: jtraglia
content: <@363800010518822915> <@755590043632140352> any last minute ePBS changes you want included in the upcoming release?

author: potuz
content: not that I am aware, we need the release because of the structure changes, there' s the one that changed the ordering of fields in the sidecar. IF there are no more structure changes for devnet zero, we are happy with this release and no more structure changes should be allowed until devnet 0
